fullplot: When NYPD detective Artie Lewis' colleague and friend is shot in a police operation, he and his wife Rita want to adopt his three little children. But they have to realize that their income doesn't suffice for the required larger home. So Artie decides to take the money from the drug-dealing mobster Benjamino.
plot: One good cop has to fight the bad guys and take care of his partner's three little girls after he is killed in the line of fire.
title: One Good Cop
